projects.title: Bebot
projects.description:
This is a music-playing bot I use with my friends on Discord.
This project has gone through multiple iterations, and I am still frequently updating it and exploring new features.
It interacts with Discord's API through the discord.py Python library and uses yt-dlp for searching and downloading audio tracks.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description:
This website.
It is a simple and clean portfolio to showcase my projects.
For its development, I used Go together with the Gin framework for the backend, Tailwind CSS for the styling, HTMX for loading dynamic content, and Templ as the templating language.

projects.title: CarpinchoMQ
projects.description:
CarpinchoMQ was a team project for the course 'Implementation of Concurrent Software Architectures.'
It is a distributed message broker developed in Elixir using the Horde library.
The project also included a small JavaScript library that could be used as a client to connect to the network as well as a small front-end administration application, developed with React.

projects.title: GeoQuest
projects.description:
GeoQuest is an AR treasure hunting game for Android devices.
It was developed in the context of an university team assignment.
Using image recognition and AR, we developed a game intended to be used in cultural spaces such as museums, art galleries, etc.
Players would take part in predefined quests, following different clues and using their mobile phones to make the stories come to life.
The projet also includes another app used to validate discount coupons obtained after each quest.
